parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the functions to retrieve.

parameters.name: fcVersion
parameters.description:
The version of Function Compute to which the functions belong.

*   v3: Only lists functions of Function Compute 3.0.
*   v2: Only lists functions of Function Compute 2.0.

By default, this parameter is left empty and functions in both Function Compute 3.0 and Function Compute 2.0 are listed.

parameters.name: gpuType
parameters.description: The GPU type of the functions to retrieve.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of functions to return. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 100.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the function name.

parameters.name: runtime
parameters.description: The runtime of the functions to retrieve.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tag of the functions to retrieve.
